title: Game-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Online collaborative tools for project outcome sharing in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Cultivating the ability to analyze the integration of game mechanics (scores, levels, rewards) with mathematical concepts when designing educational math games
Developing game design prototypes through a three-stage or higher instructional design process based on the Gagné model

Learners develop one HTML5-based microlearning game optimized for mobile environments (Android/iOS) within one week, submitting a prototype meeting evaluation criteria: content readability ≥80%, ≥3 interactive features, and loading time ≤3 seconds.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
